Name: Just One
About the game: How are you Master? We have a new mission for you! Just One is an action-funny game that proves once again that desire and effort conquers everything. Your mission as the main hero is tasked with freeing the island from the red robots and their bosses. The main difficulty is that to escape from this island you will have to survive and pass those 50 levels by killing all the enemies You're on your own, this is why you should use each bullet efficiently. Try to choose the correct position from where you can do as much damage as possible. Ready? Game Features : - 50 levels - Boss rounds - Weapons in both hands
